icon_wound.componentleveltooltip: They have suffered serious injuries from battle. Any further injury may have fatal consequences!

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: This Character has gone Berserk and cannot be controlled.

icon_unruly.componentleveltooltip: This unit has disobeyed your orders, charging without command!
